title: Broken Pieces and Secret Wishes
description: CalebI’m in love with two men.Being poly isn’t an issue for me, but loving unavailable men is.I’ve loved my oblivious best friend for what feels like forever and I’m slowly falling for his boyfriend. Isn’t that great? Finding the person whose pieces fit mine seems to be impossible.Or is it?**Broken Pieces and Secret Wishes is a MMM, hurt/comfort, angsty contemporary romance with an HEA.
author: L. Luther
